aka: From a Night Porter's Point of View

writer.name: 克日什托夫·基耶斯洛夫斯基 Krzysztof Kieślowski

director.name: 克日什托夫·基耶斯洛夫斯基 Krzysztof Kieślowski

trans_title: From a Night Porter's Point of View
introduction: At the time of the Polish social regime, a security officer is promoted to work at a prison yard. Introducing concurrently with the narrator; he speaks of himself, his thoughts, his point of view. He tells that he is not afraid of bandits or gangs; on the contrary he gets a kick out armed conflicts. To get a start in his new duty, he shops for a watchdog; and he buys an untrain...
